snippet.title: A Little Perspective - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3485300/A_Little_Perspective/

I've been working on redesigning, rebuilding, and expanding my most popular Dreams game for about 1.5 years. Here's the trailer. Demo coming soon :)
